          <title>
            <string language="en">Iron burning in oxygen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eisen, das im Sauerstoff brennt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fer brûlant en oxygène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ferro que queima-se no oxigênio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ferro che si brucia in ossigeno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάψιμο σιδήρου στο οξυγόνο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hierro que se quema en oxígeno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an oxidation reaction between iron and oxygen to make iron oxide.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">burning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Oxidation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Oxidation Reaktion 
zwischen Eisen und Sauerstoff, um Eisenoxid zu bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que une réaction 
d'oxydation entre le fer et l'oxygène préparait l'oxyde de fer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma reação da 
oxidação entre o ferro e o oxigênio para fazer o óxido do ferro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una reazione di 
ossidazione fra ferro ed ossigeno per preparare l'ossido del ferro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει αντίδραση οξείδωσης 
μεταξύ του σιδήρου και του οξυγόνου για να κάνει το οξείδιο 
σιδήρου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una reacción de la 
oxidación entre el hierro y el oxígeno para hacer el óxido del 
hierro.</string>
          </description>
